metadata.name: DNS Query To Ufile.io - DNS Client
metadata.comment: Detects DNS queries to "ufile.io", which was seen abused by malware and threat actors as a method for data exfiltration

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM dns_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND metadata.event_code = 3008 AND contains(lower(query.hostname), lower('ufile.io')))

output.summary: Detects DNS queries to "ufile.io", which was seen abused by malware and threat actors as a method for data exfiltration

metadata.objective: False positive: DNS queries for "ufile" are not malicious by nature necessarily. Investigate the source to determine the necessary actions to take Reference: https://thedfirreport.com/2021/12/13/diavol-ransomware/
